message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $90. It's in great condition and worth a lot to me. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $75 for it. I hope this works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $75 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $85. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
